issue.title: [JS] Document browser support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12808](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12808). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For example in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10340 we're explicitly removing support for IE. We should at least document that IE support is an explicit non-goal. Even better if we can identify supported version ranges for major browsers.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12808?focusedCommentId=17349831) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10360
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10360>
